articles.author: Panu Wongcha-Um, Panarat Thepgumpanat
articles.description: The Thailand-Cambodia border, where fighting has raged since last week, was calm following a ceasefire deal and military commanders from both sides are set to meet for talks later in the day, acting Thai Prime Minister Phumtham Wechayachai said.
articles.title: Thailand-Cambodia border calm as military-level talks postponed
